content.raw:
Why not hard-code a list of "default enabled" plugins, and anything not on the list defaults to disabled?

That way we can change the list over time (such as when an experimental feature reaches stability) rather than basing it on the current set of plugins that happen to be there.
content.html:
Why not hard-code a list of "default enabled" plugins, and anything not on the list defaults to disabled?

That way we can change the list over time (such as when an experimental feature reaches stability) rather than basing it on the current set of plugins that happen to be there.
